segments.text: Hi , Mr . Smith . Are you enjoying the cookout ? You don't look too happy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I spent the morning at the cemetery . I put flowers on the graves of my old war buddies .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is that what people usually do on Memorial Day ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They should . This holiday is about remembering our war dead . But people these days think it's just a holiday for summer sales and cookouts !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry to hear that . Thank you for telling me a little more about it .
segments.speaker: S1
